title: "What are the obstacles to achieving spiritual development during rituals?"
first_phrase: In this final portion of the text, the author describes some of the challenges that individuals may face during the practice of religious rituals. These challenges include dealing with insects, ignoring bodily sensations, and overcoming fear and surprise during unexpected experiences. The author also emphasizes that the work of spiritual growth extends beyond the ritual itself and requires maintaining a constant state of awareness and self-control in daily life. The benefits of this practice are seen as important to individuals seeking spiritual growth, but may be difficult to achieve in a busy, modern world.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the path towards spiritual development is not an easy one, as obstacles may arise from both external and internal factors. However, it is important to remain conscious and in control at all times, resisting the urge to be consumed by daily distractions or unexpected events. The journey towards spiritual growth requires patience, perseverance, and dedication, but ultimately, it is the greatest work of all.
